meanings.definition: A musical instrument consisting of a series of tubes of different lengths tied together, played by blowing across the top of the tubes.
meanings.sent1: The musician played beautiful melodies on the panpipes.
meanings.sent2: I heard the soothing sound of panpipes echoing through the forest.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to play the panpipes but ended up making funny noises.
meanings.sent4: Her voice flowed like music from the panpipes, enchanting all who listened.
meanings.sent5: The panpipes whispered secrets of the ancient woods to those who stopped to listen.
